properties.entry: SELECT ITEM_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, PRICE, ITEM_NAME, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME THUMBNAIL FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN ITEM_ATTACHMENT ON (ITEM_CODE = REF_CODE) WHERE I.STATUS='Y' AND FILE_LEVEL=1 ORDER BY SALES_VOL DESC
SELECT ITEM_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PRICE, ITEM_DETAIL, ITEM_CODE FROM ITEM JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND ITEM_CODE=?
Insert into HEALTHLIFE.ITEM (ITEM_CODE, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_NAME, PRICE, SALES_VOL, STATUS, ITEM_DETAIL) values (SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?,0,'Y', ?)
INSERT INTO ITEM_ATTACHMENT(FILE_CODE, REF_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT FILE_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ITEM_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_CODE=? AND STATUS='Y'
INSERT INTO COMPONENT(ITEM_CODE, CATEGORY_NO, PROTIN, CARBO, CALORIE, SALT, FAT, CHOL, SATURATED_FAT, SUGAR, TRANS_FAT) VALUES(SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
